text: John Walter Jones (28 March 1946 â€“ 24 September 2020)Companies House - director; Retrieved 14 January 2016 was a Welsh civil servant and executive. He was the first Chief Executive of the Welsh Language Board, a post which he held between 1993 and 2004. Jones was born in Moelfre, Anglesey. Jones died in September 2020 at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Welsh politicians Category:British civil servants
title: John Walter Jones
